com.io7m.r1.kernel.types

Interface KVisibleSetLightGroupBuilderType

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    KVisibleSetLightGroupBuilderWithCreateType

    public interface KVisibleSetLightGroupBuilderType
    The type of mutable builders for visible set light groups.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void groupAddInstance(KInstanceOpaqueType o)
      Add an instance to the group.
      void groupAddLight(KLightType light)
      Add a light to the group.

    • Method Detail

      • groupAddInstance

        void groupAddInstance(KInstanceOpaqueType o)
               throws RExceptionInstanceAlreadyUnlit,
                      RExceptionInstanceAlreadyInGroup,
                      RExceptionBuilderInvalid,
                      RExceptionInstanceAlreadyVisible
        Add an instance to the group.
        Parameters:
        o - The instance.
        Throws:
        RExceptionInstanceAlreadyUnlit - If the given instance has already been added to the scene without lighting.
        RExceptionInstanceAlreadyInGroup - If the given instance has already been added to a light group.
        RExceptionBuilderInvalid - If the builder has been invalidated.
        RExceptionInstanceAlreadyVisible - If the instance is already visible in the scene.

      • groupAddLight

        void groupAddLight(KLightType light)
            throws RExceptionBuilderInvalid
        Add a light to the group.
        Parameters:
        light - The light.
        Throws:
        RExceptionBuilderInvalid - If the builder has been invalidated.
